EaiObjectMap.Name: Account Details
EaiObjectMap.SourceObjectName: VF Account Details – Data Map Input

EaiComponentMap.Name: Sync SF Account Info
EaiComponentMap.SourceSearchSpecification: [SyncToSF] IS NOT NULL AND [&SyncDataInfo] IS NOT NULL

EaiFieldMap.SourceFieldExpression: IIF(Len([Master Account Tax Exempt Number]) = 9, [Master Account Tax Exempt Number],"")

EaiComponentMap.Name: CUT Address
EaiComponentMap.SourceSearchSpecification: ([Start Date] <= Today() AND ([End Date] > Today() OR [End Date] is null)) AND ([Address Format] <> "Service")
